data.lyric:
[ti:listen before i go]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]listen before i go - Billie Eilish
[00:00.18]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.36]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.54]Take me to the rooftop
[00:04.95]I wanna see the world when I stop breathing turning blue
[00:19.73]Tell me love is endless don't be so pretentious
[00:29.40]Leave me like you do
[00:34.66]Like you do
[00:37.81]If you need me wanna see me
[00:47.27]Better hurry 'cause I'm leaving soon
[00:58.00]Sorry can't save me now
[01:07.67]Sorry I don't know how
[01:17.24]Sorry there's no way out
[01:22.06]Sorry
[01:25.78]But down
[01:30.34]Hmm down
[01:36.53]Taste me these salty tears on my cheek
[01:43.45]That's what a year long headache does to you
[01:55.23]I'm not okay I feel so scattered
[02:00.48]Don't say I'm all that matters
[02:05.50]Leave me déjà vu Hmm
[02:13.89]If you need me wanna see me
[02:23.13]You better hurry I'm leaving soon
[02:34.10]Sorry can't save me now
[02:38.91]Sorry
[02:43.59]Sorry I don't know how
[02:48.40]Sorry
[02:53.21]Sorry there's no way out
[02:58.10]Sorry
[03:01.75]But down
[03:06.32]Hmm down
[03:12.51]Call my friends and tell them that I love them
[03:21.06]And I'll miss them
[03:25.62]But I'm not sorry
[03:31.66]Call my friends and tell them that I love them
[03:40.31]And I'll miss them
[03:46.20]Sorry
data.trans:
[ti:listen before i go]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:00.54]带我去屋顶上
[00:04.95]在我停止呼吸之前 我想看着这个世界一点点暗下来
[00:19.73]告诉我 爱情永远存在 别那么自命不凡
[00:29.40]你就这样离开了我
[00:34.66]离开了我
[00:37.81]如果你还需要我 想见见我
[00:47.27]最好快点来 因为我要走了
[00:58.00]抱歉 你救不了我了
[01:07.67]抱歉 我也不知道该怎么做
[01:17.24]抱歉 我找不到出路
[01:22.06]抱歉
[01:25.78]那就这样吧
[01:30.34]就这样吧
[01:36.53]看看我满脸的泪水
[01:43.45]简直比你头痛一年还要痛苦
[01:55.23]不过没事 我心已碎
[02:00.48]不要说我是你最重要的人
[02:05.50]离开我吧 反正我都习惯了
[02:13.89]如果你还需要我 想见见我
[02:23.13]最好快点来 因为我要走了
[02:34.10]抱歉 你救不了我了
[02:38.91]抱歉
[02:43.59]抱歉 我也不知道该怎么做
[02:48.40]抱歉
[02:53.21]抱歉 我找不到出路
[02:58.10]抱歉
[03:01.75]那就这样吧
[03:06.32]就这样吧
[03:12.51]帮我告诉我的朋友 我爱他们
[03:21.06]我会想他们的
[03:25.62]不过我不后悔
[03:31.66]帮我告诉我的朋友 我爱他们
[03:40.31]我会想他们的
[03:46.20]抱歉
